ballot_advertisement.title: Create DataFi LP Position with OCEAN, BANK + more
ballot_advertisement.description:
## Create LP DatFi pool for BanklessDeSci

I propose we consider creating an LP pool either on Balancer or Uniswap consiting of BANK and OCEAN. It is also an option to include some other DeSci tokens such as VITA plus WETH.

The question becomes do we do a Balancer pool with a mix bag of DataFi and DeSci? Or do we do a two token pair of OCEAN/BANK on Uni?

![image](https://github.com/BanklessDeSci/Governance/assets/150953662/fe8fb3b9-6485-433e-b0f7-97bc82e18067)



![image](https://github.com/BanklessDeSci/Governance/assets/150953662/9504f0ee-c8a8-4c23-8fc5-8adc001ca65d)
